name: Lakeview Valley (itch) (gjpt69030)
description:
When registering, the management will release the player's interpersonal relationship based on the player's background story, such as family members, classmates and friends, etc. At the same time, when interacting with these NPCs, it will determine whether the action has caused a favorable impression based on the player's actions and language. The loss or increase of aspects can be unlocked after reaching a certain degree of favorability.

At the same time, interacting with a specific NPC can obtain or ask for some items or money (such as your own parents, elders, close friends, etc.), but when the number of daily acquisitions exceeds a certain limit, the favorability of the NPC will be reduced. Sensitivity as low as a certain limit will lead to changes in the character's future plot line.

The favorability level is divided into the following levels:

Hatred - Hostility - Indifference - Insipid (initial favorability) - Familiarity - Friendly

The communication routes that can be unlocked by NPCs after reaching the friendliness level:

【Friendship Line】

【Love Line】

【Family Line】
